title: Getting leavebaster bcs client is buggy
body: I really dont care about losing some lp time to time but why i have to get leavebaster if the client isnt good at all? it happens two games i wait 20mins for 5 games and when the leavebaster goes off,and it bugs again and i get banned again with only one game! how is this fair? How is this my fault? Why i have to get leavebaster....not cools riot..not cool!

replies.body:
It really sucks that you finished up your low-priority queue and then in the very next game you ran into issues and got kicked out of the game again, but that is why you got another round of LPQ. Since you weren't able to stay in any games after the first round of LPQ, it gave you another set of penalties since you still weren't staying in the match.

Without much context as to what happened to make you leave the game, it's a little hard to help fix the main issue. It kind of sounds like you might be having a hard time staying connected to the server you're playing on, so let's be sure to cover all our bases with [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
